string.text: No, really, you need to be in campaign for this to do anyting.
Resets the AI of ordered parties. Must be in a campaign.
I want you to attack and hold an enemy party until reinforcements can arrive.
Very well. Which party would you like me to attack?
For how long should I chase the target?
Chase them until you are out of sight. If you haven't caught them yet, return.
Chase them to the ends of the earth.
